context.text: FK Ribnica - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Date Venue Home Guest Result Attendance
Here are results of last 5 derbies:

Years have passed, and Ribnica falls in the Third league. Standard member of that competition is FK Grafi ar , great local rival. In the past decades, Ribnica and Graficar were big rivals, and their matches sometimes watched more than 3,000 spectators. Today, the tradicion of Konik derby is still 'alive', and Ribnica is most successful club. In the 2006 , stadium of Grafi ar is sold to local building company, so Ribnica and Grafi ar today are playing their matches on same stadium.

In the league, Ribnica won first place, after the dramatic battle with FK Blue Star. In june 2008. club played in playoffs for promotion in Second league, which is greatest succes in the newest club history.

From the 2007 , Football club Ribnica is organising traditional Memorial tournament 'Gojko Lopi i ' . The winner of the First tournament was FK Zabjelo , and other participants were FK Kom , FK Mladost and home team - FK Ribnica.

Ribnica started season in the Central Region Cup. In the quarter-finals, 'lions' played against FK Blue Star and won - 3:0. At the September 3rd, Ribnica played first match in new Third League season. In the First leg, Ribnica was better than FK Grafi ar - 2:0. In the final of Central Region Cup, Ribnica lose against FK Mladost (Podgorica, and after that, in first leg of Montenegrin Cup , Ribnica lose match against OFK Bar on penalties.

In the summer from Ribnica goes few talented players. Most of them gone to FK Gusinje , and KF Vele iku Koplik, Albania . At the august 2007 , Ribnica played two friendly matches against First league members. At the first match, Ribnica lose against FK Zeta - 1:5, and at the second, Ribnica played against FK De i - 1:2.

Gojko Lopi i was a general secretary of FK Ribnica in the 'glory days', when the club goes to the Federal rank (Third league). He was a member of Football association of Central Montenegrin region, too. Gojko Lopi i died in the 2006.

In the October 2007, Ribnica won the Central Region Cup. In the final match, Ribnica played against FK Iskra - 2:0. That win promoted Ribnica in the Montenegrin Cup . At the start of that competition (1/16 finals) Ribnica lose match against Mladost (0:1), and after that match few fans attacked main refree.
Third league - 'central' 2006/07 table: Iskra 46, Drezga 45, Ribnica 42, Sutjeska 'B' 40, Kom 'B' 27, Blue Star 23, Gor tak 10, Grafi ar 0.

First season in independent Montenegro , Ribnica played in the Third league, the lowest football competition. Ambition of club was promotion in Second league, and after the end of agreement with FK Budu nost, fans made their come-back to the terraces. After very successful start, Ribnica lose derby with FK Iskra Danilovgrad and after that 'lions' played few draws. In the second half of season, when Bogdan arapi replaces previous coach Neboj a Petrovi , Ribnica started with few wins, but after defeat against FK Drezga , Ribnica gone from second to third position. At the finish of championship, Ribnica lose home-ground match against FK Blue Star and that was the end of hopes about the Second league promotion. Ribnica finished at the third place.
